snippet: The stars of the holiday comedy film attend a screening at the new iPic Theater....
abstract: Actors Bryan Cranston, Zoey Deutch and others attend screening of movie Why Him? at iPic Fulton Market theater in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The stars of the holiday comedy film attend a screening at the new iPic Theater.

headline.print_headline: A Script That Never Grows Old
headline.main: Bryan Cranston, Megan Mullally and Zoey Deutch at the ‘Why Him?’ Screening
